articles.summary: Very heavy victory for Fiorentina who, by beating Pisa 1-0, not only won the Derby but also won a very important direct clash for survival.

articles.summary: Fiorentina is trying to make a comeback after a very complicated first part of the season, spent practically always in the relegation zone.

articles.title: Three consecutive victories for Parma: this hasn't happened since the days of Donadoni. And always against Milan
articles.summary: Parma have won three consecutive matches in Serie A for the first time since March 2014, with Roberto Donadoni on the bench – on that occasion, the third match was against Milan at the Meazza (4-2). Opta reports it.

articles.summary: On Sunday, Milan Futuro returned to victory away from home and did so in great style, winning 0-3 on the pitch at Caldiero Terme thanks to goals from Magrassi, Chaka Traorè and Sala.
